flawed_nl_solution:
The ants will need 8000 ounces of food because 400 x 2 = <<400*2=8000>>8000
The ant food will cost $800 because 8000 x 0.1 = <<8000*0.1=800>>800
He has earned $60 from the leaves he has raked because 6000 leaves * $0.01/leaf = $<<6000*0.01=60>>60
He earned $740 from all his jobs because 800 - 60 = <<800-60=740>>740
He completed 148 jobs because 740 / 5 = <<740/5=148>>148
#### 148

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
